Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: First the users prompt is to create a list of targeted open ended questions based on the long process description These questions should focus on clarifying and improving understanding of the property onboarding process Specifically they should cover Uncovering missing details Understanding decision criteria Clarifying roles and responsibilities Verifying timing and sequencing Learning about how exceptions are handled Importantly the questions should NOT request any SQL queries or implementation details They need to be conceptual and aimed at deepening understanding

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The process description outlines several stages 1 Landlord contacts the company and a property coordinator reviews documentation 2 Recording property details into the database 3 Assigning a dedicated property manager 4 Introductory call or meeting 5 Scheduling photographer and inspector 6 Addressing any issues from inspection 7 Creating marketing materials 8 Activating the property in systems 9 Handling tenant screening and selection 10 Finalizing lease and move in 11 Quality checks and audits Throughout there are mentions of decision points stakeholders and exceptions

Name: Validation - PE
Text: My response should be a list of questions They need to be targeted and open ended to encourage detailed responses

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Structure the questions around the key areas Missing details What information might not be fully covered For example specifics on documentation required how the database is used details on marketing etc Decision criteria Things like how property managers are assigned how tenants are selected Roles and responsibilities Who does what E g what exactly does the property coordinator do Whats the property managers role Timing and sequencing How long does each step take What is the order and are there dependencies Exceptions How are issues like missing documents or inspection failures handled

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Make sure questions are open ended starting with words like How What Can you describe etc to get more than yes no answers

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Compile a list 1 Start with general questions about the overall process 2 Then drill down into specific stages 3 Ensure the list is comprehensive but not overwhelming aim for 8 12 questions

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Finally present it as a numbered or bulleted list
